'''Dean Whatton''' is a dwarf actor and stunt performer.

In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''Â he portrayed a [[Dwarf 3|dwarf]] dressed as [[Renly Baratheon|King Renly Baratheon]] in the episode "[[The Lion and the Rose]]".

He has previously appeared in ''Little Britain'' and ''Life's Too Short''.
